title: TypeScript compilation error in useWebRTC.test.ts
issue: TypeScript reports 'Declaration or statement expected' error at line 1067 (the file's closing `});`). This appears to be caused by an unclosed block or syntax error earlier in the file. The error prevents the widget typecheck from passing.
suggestion: Review the file structure to find any unclosed blocks or syntax errors. Common causes: missing closing braces, unclosed template literals, or malformed test blocks.
